data.lyric:
[ti:LOST IN THE CITADEL]
[ar:Lil Nas X]
[al:MONTERO (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]LOST IN THE CITADEL - Lil Nas X
[00:01.89]Lyrics by：Montero Hill/John Cunningham
[00:03.79]Composed by：Montero Hill/John Cunningham
[00:05.69]Tell me are you feeling down
[00:07.69]
[00:10.88]Are you happy do your dreams still seem in them
[00:15.29]
[00:16.00]Tell me are we finished now
[00:18.65]
[00:20.54]Cause every time you leave you find your way to come back around
[00:23.11]
[00:26.06]I need time to get up and get off the floor
[00:28.61]
[00:31.09]I need time to realize that I can't be yours
[00:33.67]
[00:36.33]I need time to give up just like before
[00:38.85]
[00:40.99]I love it how you knew I'd only come right back for more
[00:44.11]
[00:45.43]My guardian angel
[00:47.06]
[00:47.98]I only seen you in your halo
[00:49.40]
[00:50.54]I was hoping we could stay close
[00:52.27]
[00:53.05]But we no longer sing the same notеs
[00:54.57]
[00:57.01]I remember whеn I met you
[00:58.54]
[00:59.47]Thought the universe sent you
[01:00.77]
[01:02.06]Thought you were someone I could vent to
[01:03.91]So I hit your line what you getting into
[01:07.38]I need time to get up and get off the floor
[01:09.85]
[01:12.42]I need time to realize that I can't be yours
[01:15.07]
[01:17.55]I need time to give up just like before
[01:20.27]
[01:22.29]I love it how you knew I'd only come right back for more
[01:25.72]
[01:26.65]Why I thought it was forever
[01:28.19]
[01:29.21]I only see you maybe never
[01:30.61]
[01:31.72]Why I thought we'd be together
[01:33.44]
[01:34.33]We are treated like whatever
[01:35.80]
[01:37.02]Yeah yeah yeah
[01:38.21]My love is falling down
[01:40.50]Playing the victim when all my envisions come slowly tumbling down
[01:45.65]Putting me back on the ground
[01:47.21]I remember when I met you
[01:49.06]
[01:49.90]Thought the universe sent you
[01:51.24]
[01:52.43]Thought you were someone I could vent to
[01:54.26]So I hit your line what you getting into
[01:57.33]
[01:58.85]I need time to get up and get off the floor
[02:01.62]
[02:03.89]I need time to realize that I can't be yours
[02:06.82]
[02:09.05]I need time to give up just like before
[02:11.87]
[02:13.86]I love it how you knew I'd only come right back for more
[02:17.22]
[02:19.69]Tell me are you feeling down
[02:21.91]
[02:25.01]Are you happy do your dreams still seem in them
[02:29.95]Tell me are we finished now
[02:32.66]
[02:34.51]'Cause every time you leave you find your way to come back around
data.trans:
[ti:LOST IN THE CITADEL]
[ar:Lil Nas X]
[al:MONTERO (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.89]//
[00:03.79]//
[00:05.69]请告诉我 你是否感觉情绪低落
[00:07.69]
[00:10.88]你是否快乐 你的梦想是否仍寄托在他们身上
[00:15.29]
[00:16.00]请告诉我 我们是否分道扬镳
[00:18.65]
[00:20.54]因为每次你离开 你都会找到归途 回到我的身边
[00:23.11]
[00:26.06]我需要时间 重振旗鼓 从地面站起来
[00:28.61]
[00:31.09]我需要时间 渐渐明白我无法成为你的专属
[00:33.67]
[00:36.33]我需要时间 才能像以前一样放弃
[00:38.85]
[00:40.99]我喜欢你知道我只会回到你身边 寻求更多的爱
[00:44.11]
[00:45.43]我的守护天使
[00:47.06]
[00:47.98]我只看到你身负光环
[00:49.40]
[00:50.54]我曾希望我们能亲密无间
[00:52.27]
[00:53.05]但是我们不再唱着同样的曲调
[00:54.57]
[00:57.01]我还记得与你邂逅时
[00:58.54]
[00:59.47]以为你是上苍赐给我的礼物
[01:00.77]
[01:02.06]以为你是我可以倾诉的对象
[01:03.91]所以我给你打去电话 你有什么打算
[01:07.38]我需要时间 重振旗鼓 从地面站起来
[01:09.85]
[01:12.42]我需要时间 渐渐明白我无法成为你的专属
[01:15.07]
[01:17.55]我需要时间 才能像以前一样放弃
[01:20.27]
[01:22.29]我喜欢你知道我只会回到你身边 寻求更多的爱
[01:25.72]
[01:26.65]为什么我认为这就是天长地久
[01:28.19]
[01:29.21]我也许永远也见不到你
[01:30.61]
[01:31.72]为什么我认为我们会在一起
[01:33.44]
[01:34.33]我们将彼此当做无关紧要的存在
[01:35.80]
[01:37.02]//
[01:38.21]我的爱日益消逝
[01:40.50]当所有幻想慢慢破灭时 扮演成无辜的受害者
[01:45.65]让我回归现实
[01:47.21]我还记得与你邂逅时
[01:49.06]
[01:49.90]以为你是上苍赐给我的礼物
[01:51.24]
[01:52.43]以为你是我可以倾诉的对象
[01:54.26]所以我给你打去电话 你有什么打算
[01:57.33]
[01:58.85]我需要时间 重振旗鼓 从地面站起来
[02:01.62]
[02:03.89]我需要时间 渐渐明白我无法成为你的专属
[02:06.82]
[02:09.05]我需要时间 才能像以前一样放弃
[02:11.87]
[02:13.86]我喜欢你知道我只会回到你身边 寻求更多的爱
[02:17.22]
[02:19.69]请告诉我 你是否感觉情绪低落
[02:21.91]
[02:25.01]你是否快乐 你的梦想是否仍寄托在他们身上
[02:29.95]请告诉我 我们是否分道扬镳
[02:32.66]
[02:34.51]因为每次你离开 你都会找到归途 回到我的身边
